scripts.deploy:local: graph remove --node $GRAPH_ADMIN_URL ensofinance/enso-v1 && graph create --node $GRAPH_ADMIN_URL ensofinance/enso-v1 && graph deploy --node $GRAPH_ADMIN_URL --ipfs $IPFS_URL ensofinance/enso-v1
scripts.deploy:remote: graph remove --node http://$DOCKHERO_HOST:8020 ensofinance/enso-v1 ; graph create --node http://$DOCKHERO_HOST:8020 ensofinance/enso-v1 && graph deploy --node http://$DOCKHERO_HOST:8020 --ipfs http://$DOCKHERO_HOST:5001 ensofinance/enso-v1
